name: Anyplace Poker Offline. Texas Holdem with friends.
name_original: Anyplace Poker Offline. Texas Holdem with friends.
description:
Great app app to play Texas Holdem on one device. Full substitution for poker room: table, cards, chips and dealer/croupier. UP TO 6 PLAYERS!   NO ADS!

1. No need to buy chips in the app. Buy-in is FREE. 

2. Internet connection or WiFi are NOT required! Play anytime and anywhere.  3. Customize to your needs: Set any size of small and big blind.

4. Any size of initial buy-in. Additional buy-in is possible between hands (it’s FREE).  

5. Like in real poker room: Players can leave the table between hands and new players can join the game.  

6. Convenient to play even with small screen size: if needed, just pinch in / pinch out (like you do in web browser).

7. Defense from cheating: counter of # of card flips or even with password (optional).

8. You can set avatar for each player. 

9. Great design.

10. NO ADS!
